title: LF Top Laner for Silent Legends United
body:
Hello everyone, my name is SiKeDdeath and I am the creator of a team named Silent Legends United. Currently we have 4 members of our team

Our Team:
-MCFictionHD- Our ADC
-Mr Froggie- Our Support
-SiKeDdeath- Our Mid

We are looking for a Top Laner of any rank, we are a somewhat serious League team that will in the future once as we get our rank decently high try to go to and attend tournaments. If you would like to join the team add me on League (SiKeDdeath) and I can evaluate you and see your play-style. I will let you know if you are in or out and if in then I will let you know about Scrims, Practices, and you will be able to meet everyone.

Hope to see and fight with you in the Rift.
-SiKeDdeath

replies.body:
Yo, I'm down, play mostly poppy, jax, illaoi, darius tanky tops.

What ranks are your flex, I got one in gold 1 (this one), and 2 currently unranked. Add me if you want.
